basics.name: Nguyen Thanh Quan
basics.label: Engineering Manager
basics.summary: Software engineer with more than 8 years experience in building large scale system and microservices for the e-commerce and digital marketing system. Proven ability to design architecture and involve in full cycle of software development to solve the user's problem.

work.name: ShopBack
work.description: ShopBack, a leading rewards and shopping platform in APAC, now serves over 35 million users across 10 countries and powers US$3.5 billion in annual sales. The platform also facilitates 1 million shopping journeys for over 10,000 merchant partners every day.
highlights: Lead a team of six engineers, providing guidance and support to drive successful project outcomes such as: Multi tenancy, Pricing engine, Service Consolidation.
Collaborate closely with stakeholders, including Product Managers, to deliver high-impact features.
Contribute to the engineering and product vision while managing timelines and handling escalations.
Build and maintain a strong engineering culture and principles, ensuring alignment with upper management.
Involve in recruitment process to hire qualified candidate with company's core values.
Plan and oversee the entire software development lifecycle for seamless execution.
Conduct regular 1-on-1 meetings with team members to mentor and support their growth.
Lead performance reviews, offering constructive feedback, and celebrating individual and team achievements.

work.name: ShopBack
work.description: ShopBack, a leading rewards and shopping platform in APAC, now serves over 35 million users across 10 countries and powers US$3.5 billion in annual sales. The platform also facilitates 1 million shopping journeys for over 10,000 merchant partners every day.
highlights: Take part in migrating robust monolithic application to microservices.

Own and responsible for designing, developing, maintaining core services which are integrated with external third party systems like Salesforce, HasOffers for merchant on-boarding, product listing, cashback calculation to handle million active users across 9 countries.
Lead a team with 4 engineers. Plan and improve the working process with team members. Communicate with stakeholders to achieve product goals with clear documentation.
Involve in recruitment process as Technical Interviewer to hire qualified candidate with company's core values.
Write scalable, well-documented, fully tested API for internal services.
Write CICD pipelines, tools, libraries, set up projects from scratch to develop application with ease.
Involved technologies: NodeJS, TypeScript, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, AWS services, Kubernetes,...

work.name: Knorex
work.description: Knorex is a digital marketing company which provides programmatic advertising products and technologies to attract buyers worldwide.
highlights: Develop, maintain platform which helps marketers, operations to create ads themselves and build optimized ads to serve for million users across APAC.
Design, develop, maintain a platform which is a set of crawlers for extracting data from external websites to provide dynamic information within ads and creatives.
Write API for other services integration.
Technologies: HTML, CSS, AngularJS, NodeJS, Golang, MongoDB, AWS Services (S3, SQS, Elastic Transcoder, EC2,...), Mesos, Chronos,...

education.institution: Ho Chi Minh University of Technology
